headline: Citigroup Inc. (C) Cuts Base Lending Rate to 7% Eyes More Borrowers
summary: Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) is one of the best blue-chip stocks to buy now. On November 7, Barclays analyst Jason Goldberg reaffirmed his Buy rating on Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) and set a price target of $115. On October 30, Citigroup Inc. lowered its base lending rate to 7% from 7.25%. The cut highlights the bank’s effort […]
